articles.title: Rolf Harris: Serial abuser and ex-entertainer dies aged 93 - BBC
articles.description: The disgraced former TV entertainer, who was jailed for indecent assaults on girls, dies aged 93.
articles.content:
Disgraced former entertainer Rolf Harris, who was jailed for a series of indecent assaults on girls, has died aged 93.
Harris was found guilty of a string of indecent assaults between 1968 and 1986 … [+2124 chars]
